snippet: The Senate on Thursday voted to designate March 19 as a national day of remembrance for the French and Algerian victims of the Algerian war of independence from 1954 to 1962.
abstract: French Senate votes to designate March 19 as a national day of remembrance for the French and Algerian victims of the Algerian war of independence from 1954 to 1962.
lead_paragraph: The Senate on Thursday voted to designate March 19 as a national day of remembrance for the French and Algerian victims of the Algerian war of independence from 1954 to 1962.

headline.main: France: A Day for a War’s Victims
headline.print_headline: France: A Day for a War’s Victims
